spatialReferenceSystem.label: WGS 84
spatialReferenceSystem.wkt: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["WGS_1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84",6378137,298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich",0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree",0.01745329251994328, AUTHORITY["EPSG","9122"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

text.name: plot_file

boolean.name: land_use_subcategory_year_of_change_know
boolean.relevant: land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_subcategory!='GLtoGL' and land_use_subcategory!='FLtoFL' and land_use_subcategory!='SLtoSL' and land_use_subcategory!='OTtoOT' and land_use_subcategory!='WLtoWL' and land_use_subcategory!='CLtoCL'
boolean.label: Land Use Change - Known year of change

number.name: land_use_subcategory_year_of_change
number.relevant: land_use_subcategory_year_of_change_know=true() and land_use_category!='noData' and land_use_subcategory!='GLtoGL' and land_use_subcategory!='FLtoFL' and land_use_subcategory!='SLtoSL' and land_use_subcategory!='OTtoOT' and land_use_subcategory!='WLtoWL' and land_use_subcategory!='CLtoCL'
number.label: Land Use Change - Year of change
